ExportDataConfig.name: export measures-data
ExportDataConfig.title: "KPI Id"; "Date"; "Target"; "Actual"; "Frequency"; "Organization Id"; "Employee No"
ExportDataConfig.sql: select KPI_ID, DATE, TARGET, ACTUAL, FREQUENCY, ORG_ID, EMP_ID from bb_measure_data order by KPI_ID, FREQUENCY, DATE asc limit 15000
